column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I come here all the time and I truly never get tired of it. The broth is super rich and packed with flavor
column2: the noodles are just the right texture
column3: and the service is attentive. I get something different everything
column4: but my favorite is still the Spicy Tonkatsu ramen. If you're looking for somewhere semi-casual to eat with friends
